description:
This Course consists of two main areas of SAP.Â™ :-

1. Material Master Archiving

2. Mass Change in Materials

First article describes a process called Material Master Archiving in simple method. It is very simple and minimum time consumption process for Material archiving.

Second Article explain about the process of executing the Mass changes in Material Master.

I have used the Power Point Presentation along with SAP Demonstration.

This course consists of more than 15 videos which are very easy to understand.

Students should opt for this course as it will help them in their SAP Career and SAP Learning.
title: Learn SAP Material Master Archiving & Mass Change
